Project.Brief history of your project and organi: YouToo Robot is a technology company dedicated to simplifying the application of industrial robots. Founded by a group of graduates from The Chinese University of Hong Kong, the company leverages algorithms and artificial intelligence to overcome technical barriers in industrial robot usage, providing efficient and flexible robot control solutions for manufacturers worldwide.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1.Robot 3D Model Data
•CAD files: Detailed designs and schematics of robotic components.
•Simulation data: Files related to robot behavior simulation and performance testing.
•Firmware backups: Data essential for the functioning of robots.
•AI model files: Pre-trained models and datasets for robotic AI functions.
	
2.Multimedia Content
•Customer records: Photos and videos documenting customer activities at the venue.
•Archived content: Videos and images for marketing campaigns, including YouTube channel uploads.

3.Backup Data
•Distributed backups of sensitive data replicated across nodes in different regions to ensure redundancy and disaster recovery.

The total storage requirement is approximately 850TB, with backups spread across six geographically distributed nodes to ensure data availability and reliability.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1. Data Classification and Organization	
•Action: Group images and videos by theme, type, or time.
•Tools: macOS Finder, Linux File Manager, Python scripts.
•Purpose: Ensure data is structured for easy access and management.

2. Data Compression
•Action: Compress files into ZIP or TAR archives for efficient uploading and storage.
•Tools: 7-Zip, tar command, or Python libraries like zipfile.
•Purpose: Reduce file fragmentation and ensure data integrity.

3. Data Integrity Verification
•Action: Verify file integrity using checksums (e.g., MD5, SHA-256).
•Tools: sha256sum command or Python libraries like hashlib.
•Purpose: Ensure data is not corrupted during preparation or transfer.
